name: Strange Dataset
description:
Have you ever wondered, how do neural networks feel when processing images? Wonder no more. This is perfect experience of discovery and not knowing what even simplest words mean.

The goal is to find all images that match the description. There is only one catch though...

edit: I've just found a puzzle desing mistake: in few places there can be more than one  correct interpretation of given definition. It wasn't intended and will be fixed after jam. But for now, if you've encountered this, choose the defenition that fits more given images.
